common.environmentDesc: Environment variables are saved with the process
common.publishVersionDesc: Memory won't restore with version rollback.
common.draftBoxDesc: A single workflow can save up to 50 drafts, older drafts will be overwritten.
common.agentPublishTips: Publishing internally will auto-initiate approval. Once approved, all employees can use it.
common.creator: Creator
common.searchKeywordsPlaceholder: Match in specified knowledge base using keywords,
common.maxReturnCountDesc: Max number of paragraphs returned from the knowledge base. More paragraphs with higher values.
common.minMatchRatioDesc: Select paragraphs based on match ratio to return to the model. Content below the set match ratio will not be recalled.
common.vectoringDesc: Converting data to vector form for standardized input for model learning and data processing.
common.vectorFailDesc: Data conversion failed, click to retry
common.firstTimeVectorDesc: The "${name}" you selected has not been vectorized yet. Confirm to start the vectorization process asynchronously. During conversion, the knowledge base data can't be used in AI assistant replies, but configuration operations are unaffected.
common.retryVectorDesc: The "${name}" you selected has been vectorized before. Confirm to restart the vectorization process asynchronously. During conversion, the knowledge base data can't be used in AI assistant replies, but configuration operations are unaffected.
common.temperatureDesc: Temperature controls randomness. Lower temperature results in less random completions. As temperature approaches zero, the model becomes deterministic and repetitive. Higher temperature results in more random completions.
common.autoMemoryDesc: When enabled, previous conversation content is loaded as context into the node
common.maxRecordDesc: The node remembers up to n messages, where n is the max memory count you set
common.agentScopeDesc: Assistant level: Store dynamic tokens for AI assistant calling external APIs
common.userScopeDesc: User level: Store personalized information like 'My name is XX, I am XX years old'
common.topicScopeDesc: Topic level: Store file links for analysis under this topic, can be passed through the main flow to tools
common.conversationIdDesc: Test run memory exists in this conversation
common.name: Name
common.businessIdDesc: If "Business ID" is specified, update operation will prioritize it
common.emptyDraftDesc: A single workflow can save up to 50 drafts
common.goToTargetTools: Go to Corresponding Tool for Editing
common.invalidKnowledgeDatabase: No Permission or Invalid Knowledge Base
common.asyncCallDesc: When enabled, the tool call won't block subsequent process execution even if not completed
common.organizationChangeTips: Organization has changed and will return to AI Assistant page
common.confirmToUpdateVersion: Are you sure to update to the latest version? Update dependent nodes in a timely manner
common.thirdPartyPlatformDesc: Before publishing to a third-party platform, please complete the platform configuration first, then click 'Publish'.
common.dingTalkRightTitle: Create DingTalk Bot and Enable Permissions
common.tryToChatWithAI: Try to chat with AI Assistant
common.intoDingTalkInfo: 1. Navigate to the DingTalk app, click 'Add Application Capability', and select 'Add Bot'.
common.addAgentInfo: 2. After adding, go to 'Bot Configuration' and fill in the 'Message Receive Mode' and 'Message Receive URL' below.
common.dingTalkPowerInfo: 3. In the DingTalk app, find 'Permission Management' and enable the permissions:
common.identificationPlaceholder: Enter an identifier to distinguish multiple data under the same platform
common.invalidModel: Model has been disabled or deleted
common.feiShuRightTitle: Create FeiShu Bot and Enable Permissions
common.intoFeiShuInfo: Navigate to the FeiShu app, click 'Add Application Capability', and select 'Add Bot'
common.addFeiShuAgentInfo: After adding, go to 'Events and Callbacks' and enter the 'Request URL' below into the 'Subscription Method'
common.feiShuSteps1: 1. Navigate to the FeiShu app, click 'Add Application Capability', and select 'Add Bot'
common.feiShuSteps2: 2. After adding, go to 'Events and Callbacks' and enter the 'Request URL' below into the 'Subscription Method'
common.feiShuSteps3: 3. In 'Events and Callbacks', add/enable the event 'Receive Messages 2.0'
common.feiShuSteps4: 4. In the app, find 'Permission Management' and enable the following permissions
common.readUserMessage: Read user messages sent to the bot in private chats
common.sendMessage: Get and send private chat and group messages
common.getResources: Get and upload image or file resources
common.enterpriseWeChatRightDesc: Configure Receiving Address and Trusted IP
common.intoEnterpriseWeChatInfo: 1. Enter the Enterprise WeChat application, find 'Receive Messages' and click 'Set API Receiving'
common.addEnterpriseWeChatAgentInfo: 2. Enter the 'Message Receive URL' below into the 'URL' field
common.enterpriseWeChatPowerInfo: 3. In the Enterprise WeChat application, find 'Permission Management' and enable the following permissions:
common.enterpriseWeChatLimitTips: Due to the limitations of Enterprise WeChat itself, the following may occur:
common.enterpriseWeChatChatTips: 1. AI Assistant conversations only support one-on-one conversations, and do not support group conversations
common.enterpriseWeChatRichTextTips: 2. Rich text messages such as images/videos may render unexpectedly
common.enterpriseWeChatLengthTips: 3. Message length exceeding 2048 characters will be truncated
common.corpIdDesc: CorpID can be obtained from "Enterprise WeChat Management Backend - My Enterprise - Enterprise Information"
common.corpSecretDesc: Application Secret can be obtained from "Enterprise WeChat Management Backend - Application Management - Application Details"
common.tokenDesc: Token can be obtained from "Enterprise WeChat Management Backend - Application Management - Application Details - Receive Messages - Set API Receiving"
common.aesKeyDesc: EncodingAESKey can be obtained from "Enterprise WeChat Management Backend - Application Management - Application Details - Receive Messages - Set API Receiving"
common.fileDragTip: Drag files here or click to select files

knowledgeDatabase.name: Knowledge Base
knowledgeDatabase.businessIdDesc: Specify Business ID in the workflow 'Vector Storage Node' to update this fragment
knowledgeDatabase.click2TargetKnowledge: Click to go to Knowledge Base Details
knowledgeDatabase.createVectorKnowledgeTip: Are you sure to create a vector knowledge base?
knowledgeDatabase.iconFileLimit: Size must be no less than 128*128 pixels, format supports JPG/PNG, maximum 200 KB
knowledgeDatabase.documentDesc: All files in the knowledge base can be indexed by AI Assistant/Sub Process/Tool
knowledgeDatabase.selectDocumentTip: Please select the document to operate
knowledgeDatabase.generalPatternDesc: General text block mode, the block for retrieval and recall is the same
knowledgeDatabase.segmentDelimiterDesc:
The delimiter is the character used to separate text. 

 and 
 are commonly used delimiters for separating paragraphs and lines, you can also use custom special delimiters (e.g. ***)
knowledgeDatabase.segmentOverlapSizeDesc: Setting the overlap size between segments can preserve the semantic relationship between segments, improving the recall effect. It is recommended to set it to 10% - 25% of the maximum segment length
knowledgeDatabase.segmentPreprocessReplaceRule: Replace continuous spaces, line breaks, and tabs
knowledgeDatabase.segmentPreprocessDeleteRule: Delete all URLs and email addresses
knowledgeDatabase.parentChildSegmentDesc: When using the parent-child mode, the child block is used for retrieval, and the parent block is used as the context
knowledgeDatabase.paragraphDesc: This mode splits text into paragraphs based on the delimiter and maximum block length, using the split text as the parent block for retrieval
knowledgeDatabase.fullTextDesc: The entire document is used as the parent block and retrieved directly. Note that due to performance reasons, text exceeding 10000 tokens will be automatically truncated.
knowledgeDatabase.searchSettingsDesc: About the retrieval method, you can change this setting at any time in the knowledge base settings.
knowledgeDatabase.vectorSearchDesc: Generate a query embedding and query the text segment most similar to its vector representation
knowledgeDatabase.rerankModelDesc: Reranking model will reorder the candidate document list based on the semantic matching degree to the user's question, thereby improving the result of semantic sorting
knowledgeDatabase.topKDesc: Used to filter the text segment with the highest similarity to the user's question. The system will dynamically adjust the number of segments according to the context window size of the selected model
knowledgeDatabase.scoreThresholdDesc: Used to set the similarity threshold for filtering text segments
knowledgeDatabase.fullTextSearchDesc: Index all words in the document, allowing users to query any word and return text fragments containing these words
knowledgeDatabase.hybridSearchDesc: Perform full text search and vector search simultaneously, and apply reranking steps to select the best result matching the user's question, users can set weights or configure reranking models.
knowledgeDatabase.recallTestDesc: Test the recall effect of knowledge based on the given query text.
knowledgeDatabase.inputSourceTextPlaceholder: Please enter the source text to test
knowledgeDatabase.segmentPreviewLoading: Document segmenting in progress, please wait...
knowledgeDatabase.bindEnterpriseKnowledgeDesc: Can bind enterprise documents/knowledge bases with management permissions
knowledgeDatabase.oldVersionTip: Vector knowledge base has been upgraded, the current old version vector knowledge base can still be used normally, but re-vectorization is temporarily not supported, it is recommended to create a new vector knowledge base

start.name: Start Node
start.desc: The process will start from this module when the following events are triggered
start.openWindowsDesc: Effective after how long since last opened

reply.name: Message Reply
reply.desc: Reply or send a specified content to the user

end.name: End Node
end.desc: The final node of the process, used to return the result information after the workflow runs

waitForReply.name: Wait
waitForReply.desc: The process will wait at this node for the user's next action
waitForReply.timeoutDesc: When enabled, the process will terminate if the specified time is exceeded

branch.name: Selector
branch.desc: Connect multiple downstream branches. If the set conditions are met, run the 'corresponding' branch; otherwise, run the 'else' branch

code.name: Code Execution
code.desc: Write code to process input variables and generate return values through output
code.useTemplateDesc: When a code template is used, the current block of code is overwritten

http.name: HTTP Request
http.desc: Send a request to an external HTTP service and get response data based on set parameters

curlImport.placeholder: For example: curl -X GET 'https://api.example.com/users?page=1' -H 'Authorization: Bearer token'
curlImport.supportInfo: Supports parsing HTTP methods, URL, query parameters, headers and request body
curlImport.parseError: Failed to parse cURL command, please check the format

sub.name: Subprocess
sub.desc: Assign part of the functional modules to subprocesses for orchestration to avoid the main process becoming too large
sub.invalidFlow: Flow has been disabled or deleted

tools.name: Tools
tools.desc: Reusable tool processes, delegate part of the process functionality to tools
tools.invalidTools: Tool has been disabled or deleted
tools.bigModelModeDesc: Call tools through natural language prompts
tools.argsModeDesc: Call tools by configuring input arguments

searchMembers.name: Member Search
searchMembers.desc: Find member information that meets the criteria. This node only supports viewing the members and related information visible to the interlocutor

loop.name: Loop
loop.desc: Used to repeatedly execute a series of tasks by setting loop times and logic
loop.arrayLoopDesc: Traverse sequentially based on the set array
loop.setCountDesc: Decrement loop based on the set number
loop.conditionsDesc: Terminate the loop when the set condition is met
loop.loopBodyDesc: User orchestrates the main logic of the loop
loop.loopNext: Execute Next Step After Loop Ends
loop.loopEndDesc: Used to immediately terminate the current loop and exit the loop body

knowledgeSearch.name: Knowledge Search
knowledgeSearch.desc: Perform a knowledge search on the input keywords and return matching related content
knowledgeSearch.keywordDesc: Match in specified knowledge base using keywords,

text2Image.name: Image Generation
text2Image.mjDesc: Midjourney model generates 4 images each time
text2Image.negativePromptDesc: Negative prompt for image generation, used to describe content forbidden in the artwork. Supports adding variables with "@" (system default appends reverse prompts: nsfw, nude, blurry, watermark, identifying mark, low resolution, mutated, lack of hierarchy)
text2Image.enableSRDesc: Default max width and height is 512. Enabling super resolution supports 1024, but image generation time will be delayed

groupChat.name: Create Group Chat
groupChat.desc: Create a group chat with specified members
groupChat.addCurrentUser: Add Current User to Group Chat
groupChat.addCurrentAgent: Add Current Assistant to Group Chat

llm.name: Big Model Call
llm.desc: Call large language models, generate replies using variables and prompts
llm.systemPromptPlaceholder: Fixed guide words for the big model, guide the chat direction by adjusting the content. Prompt content will be fixed at the beginning of the context,
llm.userPromptPlaceholder: Fixed guide words for the big model, guide the chat direction by adjusting the content. Prompt content will be fixed at the beginning of the context,
llm.visibleUnderstandingTip: Models without visual understanding can enhance their capabilities by mounting models with visual understanding; models with visual understanding capabilities can disable this feature

intentionRecognize.name: Intention Recognition
intentionRecognize.desc: The big model recognizes the actual intention of the content based on the input
intentionRecognize.otherIntentionDesc: Run this path when no result is matched in intention recognition

historyMessage.name: History Message
historyMessage.desc: Used to store or query historical messages

messageSearch.name: History Message Search
messageSearch.desc: Query historical messages based on specified conditions

messageMemory.name: History Message Storage
messageMemory.desc: Custom memory storage, freely choose to store any content

vectorDatabase.name: Vector Knowledge Base
vectorDatabase.desc: Supports matching or storing fragment content in the vector knowledge base

vectorStorage.name: Vector Storage
vectorStorage.desc: Store as fragments in the knowledge base
vectorStorage.saveFragmentPlaceholder: Content of the fragment to be stored,

vectorSearch.name: Vector Search
vectorSearch.desc: Perform similarity matching in multiple knowledge bases from top to bottom, matching fragments with specified similarity and quantity

vectorDelete.name: Vector Delete
vectorDelete.desc: Perform similarity matching in multiple knowledge bases from top to bottom, matching fragments with specified similarity and quantity

vectorDatabaseMatch.name: Vector Knowledge Base Match
vectorDatabaseMatch.desc: Match related vector knowledge bases through query conditions

cache.name: Persistent Database
cache.desc: Used for persistent storage or data loading

cacheGetter.name: Data Loading
cacheGetter.keyPlaceholder: Enter the key of the data to read

cacheSetter.name: Data Storage
cacheSetter.timeoutPlaceholder: Enter the expiry time of the data to store, -1 for never expire,
cacheSetter.keyPlaceholder: Enter the key of the data to store
cacheSetter.valuePlaceholder: Enter the value of the data to store

variable.name: Variable
variable.desc: Used to store, update, and delete variables in the process, deletion not yet supported

variableSave.name: Variable Save
variableSave.desc: Update the variable if it exists, add the variable if it doesn't

magicTable.name: Magic Table
magicTable.desc: Used to perform CRUD operations on the specified magic table

addRecord.name: Add Record
addRecord.desc: Add a record to the specified data table

updateRecord.name: Update Record
updateRecord.desc: Update records in the specified data table

findRecord.name: Find Record
findRecord.desc: Query row records in the data table based on specified conditions

deleteRecord.name: Delete Record
deleteRecord.desc: Delete row records in the data table based on specified conditions

loader.name: Document Parsing
loader.desc: Extract text content from the file and output it as text to the next node

excel.name: Spreadsheet Parsing
excel.desc: Extract text content from the file and output it as text to the next node

textSplit.name: Text Splitting
textSplit.desc: Split long text according to predetermined strategies, strategy selection will be open in the future

documentResolve.name: Cloud Doc Parsing
documentResolve.desc: The node outputs the content of the specified cloud document in a Markdown structure

flowAssistant.title: Flow Assistant
flowAssistant.welcome:
Hello! I'm your Flow Assistant and can help you create flows using natural language.

You can tell me to:
- Create a flow with specific functionality
- Add, delete, or modify nodes
- Connect or disconnect nodes
- Save or publish your flow

Just describe what you want to achieve and I'll help you build it!
flowAssistant.error: Sorry, I couldn't process this request. Please try describing your needs again or provide more details.

mcp.name: MCP Service
mcp.confirmToUpdateVersion: Are you sure you want to update the version?
